comment.author: 11847943@N02
comment._content: A master or patron of the land? - highly probable, his body language, evokes an educated person into a degree.

comment.author: 82441964@N00
comment._content: What a great environmental portrait! I love the tight compositon that still allows enough background for a sense of place, the color and light, the way the man's face is shadowed, and the wonderfully attitudinal pose. Great work: Art. Fave. Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Art is Art, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
